email_chain.subject: Coal Inquiry - Changzhou/Nantong
email_chain.body:
Dear Josue,

We are seeking freight quotes for a coal shipment from Changzhou to Nantong, CIF basis. Cargo size approximately 11624 MT.

Please advise on available options.

Regards,
Jacob Zamora

email_chain.subject: Re: Coal Inquiry - Changzhou/Nantong
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Zamora,

Thank you for your inquiry.

We can offer the following:

1. SEAWAYS DIAMOND HEAD, about 299989 DWT, LOA 333m. Freight: USD 30.43/MT
2. SEAWAYS ENTERPRISE, about 300000 DWT, LOA 336m. Freight: $30.75 per metric tonne. Laycan 10-14 April.

Please advise which option is more suitable.

Best regards,
Josue Watson
Anderson Shipping Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Coal Inquiry - Changzhou/Nantong
email_chain.body:
Dear Josue,

Thanks for the quick reply. Regarding the Diamond Head, can you clarify the earliest loading date? We'd prefer that option given the rate. Also, what is the demurrage rate per day for Diamond Head?

Regards,
Jacob Zamora

email_chain.subject: Re: Coal Inquiry - Changzhou/Nantong
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Zamora,

The earliest loading date for Diamond Head is April 8th. Demurrage is USD 25000/day. 

We await your further instructions.

Best regards,
Josue Watson
Anderson Shipping Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Coal Inquiry - Changzhou/Nantong
email_chain.body:
Dear Josue,

Thanks. Can you do $30.00/MT for the SEAWAYS DIAMOND HEAD? We will confirm stem at Changzhou soc.

Regards,
Jacob Zamora

email_chain.subject: Re: Coal Inquiry - Changzhou/Nantong
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Zamora,

Agreed. USD 30.00/MT for SEAWAYS DIAMOND HEAD is acceptable. Please confirm stem details ASAP.

Best regards,
Josue Watson
Anderson Shipping Brokers

email_chain.subject: LNG Shipment: Houston Anch to Changxindao
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Wood,

Further to our discussion, we can offer the GASLOG GEORGETOWN for your 3154 MT LNG cargo from Houston Anch to Changxindao, under DDP terms.

Our initial freight indication is USD 66 per MT.

Please advise if this is of interest.

Best regards,
Felipe Murillo
Seaway Commercial Brokers

email_chain.subject: RE: LNG Shipment: Houston Anch to Changxindao
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Murillo,

Thank you for the prompt response. The rate is a bit higher than anticipated.

Could you please confirm the laycan for Houston and the demurrage rate per day? Also, would there be any discount available if we commit to a higher volume of LNG shipments over the next quarter (e.g., 3 more shipments of similar size)?

Regards,
Eric Wood

email_chain.subject: RE: LNG Shipment: Houston Anch to Changxindao
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Wood,

Thank you for your inquiry.

The laycan for Houston is 2017-01-15 / 2017-01-18. The demurrage rate is US$ 35,000 per day, pro rata. Regarding a volume commitment, we could potentially revise the freight rate to $64 per MT for the initial shipment, subject to a firm agreement for the additional 3 shipments, to occur before March 31, 2017.

Kind regards,
Felipe Murillo
Seaway Commercial Brokers

email_chain.subject: RE: LNG Shipment: Houston Anch to Changxindao
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Murillo,

That sounds promising. Please send me a draft contract incorporating the $64/MT rate and the volume commitment clause. We need to review it internally before proceeding.

Regards,
Eric Wood

email_chain.subject: RE: LNG Shipment: Houston Anch to Changxindao - Contract Draft Attached
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Wood,

Please find attached the draft contract for your review. The agreed freight rate is $64 per MT, contingent upon the commitment for 3 additional shipments as discussed. The DWT of the GASLOG GEORGETOWN is 88184 and its LOA is 293m.

We await your feedback.

Best regards,
Felipe Murillo
Seaway Commercial Brokers

Disclaimer: This email and any attachments are confidential and intended solely for the use of the individual or entity to whom they are addressed.

email_chain.subject: CORRECTION: RE: LNG Shipment: Houston Anch to Changxindao - Contract Draft Attached
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Wood,

My apologies, there was an error in the previous email.

The agreed freight rate is $64 per MT. Everything else remains the same as per our last email.

Please disregard the previous contract. This is the correct one.

Best regards,
Felipe Murillo
Seaway Commercial Brokers

Disclaimer: This email and any attachments are confidential and intended solely for the use of the individual or entity to whom they are addressed.

email_chain.subject: Alu Freight - Novorossiysk to Jiangyin
email_chain.body:
Morning Jerry,

Hope you're well. Got a nice bit of Aluminum for you - 7051MT from Novorossiysk to Jiangyin, DDP terms. Laycan flexible, say around end Feb/early March. How does EUR61.46 sound? Vessel is TRUE CAPTAIN, around 180k DWT, nice and modern.

Cheers,
Julie
Anderson Shipping Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Alu Freight - Novorossiysk to Jiangyin
email_chain.body:
Julie,

EUR61.46 is a bit punchy, isn't it? We moved similar cargo on the same route back in December for EUR58.50. Can you sharpen your pencil?

Jerry Dominguez
Global Metals

email_chain.subject: Re: Alu Freight - Novorossiysk to Jiangyin
email_chain.body:
Jerry,

Yeah, fair enough, market's shifted a tad since Dec. Let me see what I can do. Iu, the TRUE CAPTAIN has been booked by other clients so I’m currently checking with other vessels in the area. Give me an hour.

Cheers,
Julie

email_chain.subject: Re: Alu Freight - Novorossiysk to Jiangyin
email_chain.body:
Jerry,

Okay, best I can do right now is EUR 60.50. We're talking about spot market here. Vessel owners are playing hardball. Includes standard demurrage of USD 15000 per day, pro rata. Think of it like this: good price for the tonnage, DLOSP. Let me know.

Julie

email_chain.subject: Re: Alu Freight - Novorossiysk to Jiangyin
email_chain.body:
Julie,

$15k demurrage seems high. Can we get that down at all? Also, confirm laytime details for Novorossiysk.

Jerry

email_chain.subject: Re: Alu Freight - Novorossiysk to Jiangyin
email_chain.body:
Jerry,

Morning! Laytime is WWD SHINC/SHEC. As for demurrage, owner is pretty firm, but I'll have another go. Hang tight. I’m working on another potential option and I’m checking availabilities with other brokers.

Julie

email_chain.subject: Re: Alu Freight - Novorossiysk to Jiangyin
email_chain.body:
Jerry,

Right, got them to budge a bit. EUR 60.25 and demurrage down to USD 14,000 per day. This is really it, mate. Let's lock this in. What's your stem looking like? Aiming for 25-28 Feb loading window.

Julie

email_chain.subject: Re: Alu Freight - Novorossiysk to Jiangyin
email_chain.body:
Julie,

Okay, EUR 60.25 is acceptable. Stem is confirmed for 26th Feb. Let's proceed. Please send recap with all relevant details.

Jerry

email_chain.subject: CONFIRMED: Alu Freight - Novorossiysk to Jiangyin
email_chain.body:
Jerry,

Excellent! Recap sent. Many thanks. Let me know if you have any other requirements in the future.

Best,
Julie
Anderson Shipping Brokers

email_chain.subject: Freight Quote - Coal Tromso/Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Sofia,

Good morning,

We have a vessel available for your coal shipment from Tromso to Rotterdam Centrum. Cargo size 8044MT. Incoterm DAP.

Initial freight quote is AUD36.51/MT.

Let me know your thoughts.

Regards,
Ashley Kennedy
Anderson Shipping Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote - Coal Tromso/Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi Ashley,

Thanks for the quick reply.

That price seems a bit high considering the short voyage. Can you perhaps reconsider? I was thinking something closer to aud$32.00. What's the vessel name, by the way?

Best,
Sofia Molina

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote - Coal Tromso/Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Sofia,

Understood. I will see what I can do.

Vessel is AL GHUWAIRIYA (DWT 154940).

We can come down to AUD35.80/MT. This is our best offer at the moment.

Also, note that this offer is valid subject to stem and suitable laycan, dnrcaoslonl. Let me know your loading window.

Regards,
Ashley

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote - Coal Tromso/Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Ashley,

Ok, aud 35.80 is still not quite there yet, but let's agree on aud 34.50/mt and we have a deal? Our preference for loading is between January 18th and January 22nd.

Thanks,
Sofia

email_chain.subject: Freight Quote - Hazira to Bandar Abbas
email_chain.body:
Dear Mari,

Please find our firm offer for Soybeans, Hazira to Bandar Abbas Anch:

Cargo: 4207MT Soybeans
Load Port: Hazira
Discharge Port: Bandar Abbas Anch
Incoterm: CFR
Vessel: Suitable vessel
Freight: AUD40/MT

Best regards,
Tommy Bonilla
Seaway Commercial Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote - Hazira to Bandar Abbas
email_chain.body:
Dear Tommy,

Thank you for the prompt offer. 

Kindly advise vessel's DWT and LOA. Also, is this offer based on sp terms?

Best regards,
Mari Cardona
Oceanic Trading

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote - Hazira to Bandar Abbas
email_chain.body:
Dear Mari,

Vessel to be DIAMOND GAS ROSE, DWT 94145, LOA 294m. Yes, basis sp terms.

Regards,
Tommy Bonilla
Seaway Commercial Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote - Hazira to Bandar Abbas
email_chain.body:
Tommy,

AUD40 looks a bit high. Hazira is a very efficient loading port. Can you consider AUD37/MT?

Regards,
Mari

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote - Hazira to Bandar Abbas
email_chain.body:
Mari,

Meet me at AUD38.50/MT. CP details to follow if agreed.

Tommy

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote - Hazira to Bandar Abbas
email_chain.body:
Tommy,

Agreed. AUD38.50/MT. What's the laycan?

Mari

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote - Hazira to Bandar Abbas
email_chain.body:
Mari,

Laycan June 15-25. Demurrage rate USD 12000/day.

Tommy

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote - Hazira to Bandar Abbas
email_chain.body:
Tommy,

Confirmed. Please send draft CP.

Mari

email_chain.subject: Fwd: Freight Quote - Hazira to Bandar Abbas
email_chain.body:
Mari,

Attached draft CP for your review.

Tommy

email_chain.subject: Re: Fwd: Freight Quote - Hazira to Bandar Abbas
email_chain.body:
Tommy,

Thanks, will review and revert shortly.

Mari

email_chain.subject: Charter Inquiry - Cotton Fuzhou to Maasbracht
email_chain.body:
Dear Casey,

We are looking to charter a vessel for a shipment of approximately 4507 MT of cotton from Fuzhou to Maasbracht under DDP Incoterms. Could you please provide availability and indicative freight rates?

Kind regards,
Diane Kumar
GlobeEx Logistics

email_chain.subject: Re: Charter Inquiry - Cotton Fuzhou to Maasbracht
email_chain.body:
Hi Diane,

Thanks for your inquiry. I can offer the COSTA TOSCANA (DWT 13000). Indicative rate is €72.08/MT, subject to stem and bi.

Best,
Casey Nava
Maritime Exchange Ltd.

email_chain.subject: Re: Charter Inquiry - Cotton Fuzhou to Maasbracht
email_chain.body:
Hi Casey,

Thanks for the prompt response. What's the laycan window and what's the demurrage rate per day? Also, can you clarify the 'bi' subject? Is that 'business is'?

Regards,
Diane

email_chain.subject: Re: Charter Inquiry - Cotton Fuzhou to Maasbracht
email_chain.body:
Hi Diane,

Laycan is tentatively June 15-20. Demurrage is €9,500/day. 'bi' stands for 'both inclusive', meaning rate covers all standard port charges. COSTA TOSCANA has LOA of 337m.

Regards,
Casey

email_chain.subject: Re: Charter Inquiry - Cotton Fuzhou to Maasbracht
email_chain.body:
Casey,

€72.08 is a bit high for us. Could you come down a bit? We were hoping for something closer to €68.50.

Diane

email_chain.subject: Re: Charter Inquiry - Cotton Fuzhou to Maasbracht
email_chain.body:
Hi Diane,

Let me check with owners. I’ll get back to you shortly. In the meantime what is your preferred etd for the COTTON?

Casey

email_chain.subject: Re: Charter Inquiry - Cotton Fuzhou to Maasbracht
email_chain.body:
Hi Diane,

Owners are holding firm. Best they can do is €71.50/MT. Let me know if you want to proceed.

Casey

email_chain.subject: Soybeans Shipment - Minhang to Ibiza
email_chain.body:
Dear Carl,

Good morning.

We have a suitable vessel, BW ENN SNOW LOTUS (DWT 93980, LOA 295m), available for your Soybeans shipment.

Cargo: 9483 MT Soybeans
Load Port: Minhang
Discharge Port: Ibiza
Incoterm: DAP

Our initial freight quote is AUD71.26 per metric ton.

Please advise if this is of interest.

Best regards,
Stephanie Arellano
Oceanic Trade Services

email_chain.subject: Re: Soybeans Shipment - Minhang to Ibiza
email_chain.body:
Dear Stephanie,

Thanks for the quick response.

AUD71.26 seems a bit high. Can you confirm the laycan for this vessel? Also, can you come down on the rate a little?

Regards,
Carl Jordan

email_chain.subject: Re: Soybeans Shipment - Minhang to Ibiza
email_chain.body:
Dear Carl,

The laycan is Oct 24-28 in Minhang.

We can revise the rate to AUD 70.50/MT basis firm offer this afternoon before the owner comes back. 

Regards,
Stephanie Arellano
Oceanic Trade Services

email_chain.subject: Re: Soybeans Shipment - Minhang to Ibiza
email_chain.body:
Stephanie,

We accept AUD 70.50/MT subject to confirming the demurrage rate per day.

Carl Jordan

email_chain.subject: Re: Soybeans Shipment - Minhang to Ibiza
email_chain.body:
Dear Carl,

Demurrage rate is USD 25,000 per day, pro-rata. 

Confirming the rate at AUD 70.50/MT.

Thanks,
Stephanie Arellano
Oceanic Trade Services

email_chain.subject: Re: Soybeans Shipment - Minhang to Ibiza
email_chain.body:
Confirmed. Please send over the contract.

Carl Jordan

email_chain.subject: Re: Soybeans Shipment - Minhang to Ibiza - CONTRACT
email_chain.body:
Dear Carl,

Please find attached the contract for your review. 

Regards,
Stephanie Arellano
Oceanic Trade Services

email_chain.subject: Re: Soybeans Shipment - Minhang to Ibiza - CONTRACT - Dispute
email_chain.body:
Stephanie,

There is a discrepancy in the contract. The discharge terms state CIF, but we agreed on DAP in our initial discussions. This needs to be corrected.

Carl Jordan

email_chain.subject: Re: Soybeans Shipment - Minhang to Ibiza - CONTRACT - Dispute
email_chain.body:
Dear Carl,

My sincere apologies for the error. That was a mistake on my part. We'll need to revert to the owners given this change. 

The revised freight, accounting for DAP terms, is now AUD 71.00/MT. Please let me know if we may proceed based on these figures.

Regards,
Stephanie Arellano
Oceanic Trade Services

email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry - Soybeans Zhujian Kou Anch to Lianyungang
email_chain.body:
Dear Al,

We require a freight indication for about 8248 MT of Soybeans, loading Zhujian Kou Anch, discharging Lianyungang, DDP basis.

Any ideas?

Regards,
Mayra Hernández
Global Chartering Ltd.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Soybeans Zhujian Kou Anch to Lianyungang
email_chain.body:
Hi Mayra,

Thanks for the enquiry.  

For that route/cargo size, we are seeing around EUR55, basis wccon.  Subject to stem and vessel availability.  Will check on PAROS. DWT 182060 LOA 292m if suitable? 

Best,
Al Harris
Global Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Soybeans Zhujian Kou Anch to Lianyungang
email_chain.body:
Hi Al,

EUR55 seems a little high. Can you work on that figure? Also, what's the earliest loading window you can offer?

Thanks,
Mayra

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Soybeans Zhujian Kou Anch to Lianyungang
email_chain.body:
Mayra,

Let me check with owners. Earliest I think we can do is laycan 15-20 Nov, uuiwctautc. Will revert asap. Rate wise, let's see. 

Al
Global Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Soybeans Zhujian Kou Anch to Lianyungang
email_chain.body:
Al,

Any news on the rate? EUR55 is still too much for us. We're looking more at EUR52.

Mayra

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Soybeans Zhujian Kou Anch to Lianyungang
email_chain.body:
Hi Mayra,

Owners are holding firm but i can manage to get it down to EUR 53.50. What do you say ?

Cheers,
Al

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Soybeans Zhujian Kou Anch to Lianyungang
email_chain.body:
Al,

Split the difference at EUR 53 and we have a deal.

Mayra

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Soybeans Zhujian Kou Anch to Lianyungang
email_chain.body:
OK Mayra, agreed. EUR 53. Laycan 15-20 Nov, subject to stem etc. Let me draft recap. 

Al

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Soybeans Zhujian Kou Anch to Lianyungang
email_chain.body:
Perfect Al, thanks. Please include demurrage rate per day in the recap.

Mayra

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Soybeans Zhujian Kou Anch to Lianyungang
email_chain.body:
Hi Mayra,

Recap sent. Demurrage usd 18000/day. Let me know if all ok.

Al

email_chain.subject: Part Cargo Inquiry - Sugar - Valletta to Binzhou
email_chain.body:
Dear Jaime,

Hope you're well.

We have a potential part cargo of Sugar loading Valletta for discharge Binzhou. Looking at somewhere around 5600 MT. Incoterm FOB. Can you give us an idea of freight levels for this? Open to vessels in prompt position.

Regards,
Laurie Beltran

email_chain.subject: Re: Part Cargo Inquiry - Sugar - Valletta to Binzhou
email_chain.body:
Hi Laurie,

Thanks for the inquiry. I'm fine, thanks. Hope all is well with you too.

Let me check the market. For 5600 MT of sugar FOB Valletta to Binzhou, current indications are around AUD 66.28/MT. I'll check vessel availability and revert shortly. Have something in mind, NAVIOS UNISON.

Best,
Jaime Marquez
Anderson Shipping Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Part Cargo Inquiry - Sugar - Valletta to Binzhou
email_chain.body:
Hi Jaime,

Thanks for the quick response. AUD 66.28 seems a bit high. What is her DWT and LOA? Also, any idea on her laycan? We need to stem by the end of the week.

Regards,
Laurie

email_chain.subject: Re: Part Cargo Inquiry - Sugar - Valletta to Binzhou
email_chain.body:
Hi Laurie,

Understood regarding the rate. DWT 118,800 and LOA around 350m. Laycan is flexible but ideally looking at 5-10 August range. Let me see if I can shave a bit off the rate for you.

Best,
Jaime

email_chain.subject: Re: Part Cargo Inquiry - Sugar - Valletta to Binzhou
email_chain.body:
Jaime,

5-10 August works on our end. Could you try for something closer to AUD 63/MT? What's the demurrage rate per day?

Thanks,
Laurie

email_chain.subject: Re: Part Cargo Inquiry - Sugar - Valletta to Binzhou
email_chain.body:
Good Morning Laurie,

I spoke with Owners. They are willing to meet you halfway at AUD 64.50/MT. Demurrage rate is USD 25,000/day. Let me know your thoughts. We need a firm commitment soon to secure the vessel.

Regards,
Jaime

email_chain.subject: Re: Part Cargo Inquiry - Sugar - Valletta to Binzhou
email_chain.body:
Jaime,

AUD 64.50 is still a bit rich for our blood, considering the wpd at Binzhou can be unpredictable. Can they include 2 days free dem, considering the potential delays? If not, we'll need to consider other options.

Laurie

email_chain.subject: Re: Part Cargo Inquiry - Sugar - Valletta to Binzhou
email_chain.body:
Laurie,

Let me see what I can do. Getting free dem is always a challenge. Will revert asap.

Jaime

email_chain.subject: Re: Part Cargo Inquiry - Sugar - Valletta to Binzhou
email_chain.body:
Laurie,

Good news. Owners have agreed to 1 day free dem. So, AUD 64.50/MT with 1 day free dem, balance at USD 25,000 per day pro rata. Are we agreed?

Best,
Jaime

email_chain.subject: Re: Part Cargo Inquiry - Sugar - Valletta to Binzhou
email_chain.body:
Jaime,

Agreed. AUD 64.50/MT with 1 day free dem. Please send over the recap.

Thanks,
Laurie

email_chain.subject: Huanghua/Pingtan - Rice Spot Enquiry
email_chain.body:
Hi Shannon,

Hope you're having a good week.

Got a vessel opening ex Huanghua Anch for Pingtan, cargo rice. About 5981MT.

Owners looking at mid 60s, CFR free out. OOCL UTAH - good ship, DWT 101279. Any interest?

Best,
Sally Maldonado
Anderson Shipping Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Huanghua/Pingtan - Rice Spot Enquiry
email_chain.body:
Hi Sally,

Thanks for the quick offer. Mid 60s is a bit rich for our blood at the moment. What's the lowest you think owners will go? Also, what's the laycan looking like?

Shannon Velez
Global Grain Corp.

email_chain.subject: Re: Huanghua/Pingtan - Rice Spot Enquiry
email_chain.body:
Shannon,

Understood. Pushing them now... Best I can see at the moment is around $63/MT. Laycan is Oct 28 - Nov 02. Can you work with that?

Sally

email_chain.subject: Re: Huanghua/Pingtan - Rice Spot Enquiry
email_chain.body:
Sally,

Thanks. $63 is still a bit high. Our budget is closer to $60.50/MT. Can you get them there? If so, let's lock this in. What is the demurrage rate per day, if you have it?

Shannon

email_chain.subject: Re: Huanghua/Pingtan - Rice Spot Enquiry
email_chain.body:
Shannon,

Alright, twisting their arm... I think I can get them to $61.50/mt. Final offer, though! Demurrage rate is USD 10,000 per day.

LMK!
Sally

email_chain.subject: Re: Huanghua/Pingtan - Rice Spot Enquiry
email_chain.body:
Sally,

Meet me in the middle at $61? We have a stem issue we are still working on, but will know for sure by EOD. Can you confirm that this laycan (Oct 28 - Nov 02) is min/max?

Shannon

email_chain.subject: Re: Huanghua/Pingtan - Rice Spot Enquiry
email_chain.body:
Shannon,

$61/MT it is. Yes, laycan is Oct 28 - Nov 02 min/max. Give me a shout when you have confirmation on the stem. 

Cheers,
Sally

email_chain.subject: Re: Huanghua/Pingtan - Rice Spot Enquiry
email_chain.body:
Sally,

Great, thanks! Stem is confirmed, we're good to go at $61/MT, CFR free out, laycan Oct 28 - Nov 02 min/max, demurrage $10,000 per day. Can you send recap?

Shannon

email_chain.subject: Re: Huanghua/Pingtan - Rice Spot Enquiry
email_chain.body:
Shannon,

Excellent. Recap sent. Good doing business with you.

Sally
Anderson Shipping Brokers

**Disclaimer:** This email is for informational purposes only and does not constitute a legally binding agreement until a formal charter party is executed.

email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry - Cotton Shipment HKG/TXG
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Portillo,

Good morning.

Referring to your inquiry, we are pleased to offer our services for the transportation of Cotton from Hong Kong to Taixing.

We can offer space on MV YM TUTORIAL. 

Our initial freight quote is $36.39/MT DDP Taixing. Please confirm cargo size and preferred laycan.

Thank you, and we await your reply.

Sincerely,
Roberto Cohen
Oceanic Trade Services

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Cotton Shipment HKG/TXG
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Cohen,

Thank you for the prompt response. The cargo size is 1224MT. Could you clarify the laytime available at each port? Also, are there any options for a discount if we were to prepay a portion of the freight?

Regards,
Jordan Portillo

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Cotton Shipment HKG/TXG
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Portillo,

Thank you for your email. Laytime will be aa 72 hours at each port wwd sf. Regarding prepayment, we are open to considering a discount. If you prepaid 50% of the freight, we could offer a rate of USD 35.89/MT DDP Taixing. 

Please let me know if this is acceptable. 

Kind regards,
Roberto Cohen
Oceanic Trade Services

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Cotton Shipment HKG/TXG
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Cohen,

Thank you for the revised quote. The $35.89 rate is still a bit high. Could you provide the demurrage rate per day at both Hong Kong and Taixing, and whether it's pro-rata? Also, could you confirm the vessel details: DWT and LOA?

Jordan Portillo

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Cotton Shipment HKG/TXG
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Portillo,

The demurrage rate is USD 7,500/day pro-rata at both ports. Vessel YM TUTORIAL is DWT 136,899 and LOA 333m.

I can offer a final rate of $35.50/MT DDP Taixing with 50% prepayment. This is our best offer.

Regards,
Roberto Cohen
Oceanic Trade Services

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Cotton Shipment HKG/TXG
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Cohen,

Okay, we accept your offer of USD 35.50/MT DDP Taixing with 50% prepayment. Please send us the proforma invoice with payment details.

Thanks,
Jordan Portillo

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Cotton Shipment HKG/TXG
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Portillo,

Excellent. I will forward the proforma invoice to your email shortly. Please note that our payment terms require the remaining balance to be settled 3 days before the vessel's arrival at Taixing.

Thank you for your business.

Best regards,
Roberto Cohen
Oceanic Trade Services

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Cotton Shipment HKG/TXG
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Cohen,

Received with thanks, Roberto. 

Regards,
Jordan Portillo

email_chain.subject: Iron Ore Freight Inquiry - Galali to Changshu
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Mejia,

Further to our conversation, please find our best firm offer for shipment of Iron Ore, Galali to Changshu:

Commodity: Iron Ore
Quantity: 2106 MT
Load Port: Galali
Discharge Port: Changshu
Incoterm: FOB
Vessel: ELISA AQUILA (DWT 95131)

Freight: AUD60.05/MT

Subject to stem confirmation and vessel's availability. Laycan to be mutually agreed.

Best regards,
Gary Rocha
Maritime Exchange Ltd.

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Freight Inquiry - Galali to Changshu
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Rocha,

Thank you for the prompt response. I appreciate it.

Could you please confirm laytime details for the ELISA AQUILA? Also, bunker prices have seen a recent dip. Are you able to reflect this in your freight rate?

Best regards,
Tom Mejia
Globex Shipping

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Freight Inquiry - Galali to Changshu
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Mejia,

Understood regarding bunker prices. Factoring in the recent adjustments, we can revise our freight offer to AUD59.50/MT.

Laytime is typically 72 hours SHINC at load and discharge ports. Demurrage rate: USD 25,000 per day or pro rata.

Let me know your thoughts.

Kind regards,
Gary Rocha
Maritime Exchange Ltd.

email_chain.subject: Market Update - Baltic Dry & Panamax Rates - 02/03
email_chain.body:
Good morning Jessica,

Hope you are well. 

Brief market overview: Baltic Dry showing slight gains. Panamax rates stable. Good vessel availability in Goteborg area. Seeing increased demand for sugar shipments ex-Europe. Let me know if you have anything.

Best,
Rocio Walker
Global Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Market Update - Baltic Dry & Panamax Rates - 02/03
email_chain.body:
Hi Rocio,

Thanks for the update. We have a potential shipment of approx. 11195 MT of Sugar from Goteborg to Port Klang, DAP terms. Any ideas?

Regards,
Jessica Turner

email_chain.subject: Re: Market Update - Baltic Dry & Panamax Rates - 02/03 - Sugar Goteborg/Port Klang
email_chain.body:
Hi Jessica,

Okay, checking options now. 

Initial indication on a Panamax (something like GENCO TIGER, DWT 179185/LOA 292m) would be around USD87/MT, basis DAP Port Klang. More to follow shortly.

Best,
Rocio Walker

email_chain.subject: Re: Market Update - Baltic Dry & Panamax Rates - 02/03 - Sugar Goteborg/Port Klang
email_chain.body:
Rocio,

USD87/MT is a bit high. Can you work on that? Looking for something closer to USD83/MT. What's the laycan and demurrage rate per day?

Thanks,
Jessica

email_chain.subject: Re: Market Update - Baltic Dry & Panamax Rates - 02/03 - Sugar Goteborg/Port Klang
email_chain.body:
Hi Jessica,

Let me see what I can do. USD 83 is tight. Current laycan 10-15 March. Demurrage usd 28000/day.

Rgds,
Rocio

email_chain.subject: Re: Market Update - Baltic Dry & Panamax Rates - 02/03 - Sugar Goteborg/Port Klang
email_chain.body:
Rocio,

Any updates?

Jessica

email_chain.subject: Re: Market Update - Baltic Dry & Panamax Rates - 02/03 - Sugar Goteborg/Port Klang
email_chain.body:
Hi Jessica,

Managed to shave a bit off. Best I can do is USD 85/MT, all in. Vessel ready aps Goteborg within the laycan.

Best,
Rocio

email_chain.subject: Re: Market Update - Baltic Dry & Panamax Rates - 02/03 - Sugar Goteborg/Port Klang
email_chain.body:
Okay, Rocio, let's do it at $85/MT. Confirm voyage details and send full recap ASAP.

Thanks,
Jessica

email_chain.subject: Rice Freight Quote - Bruinisse to Nagoya
email_chain.body:
Dear Miguel,

Hope you're well.

We can offer you a freight rate of USD82/MT for carriage of 4989MT Rice Bruinisse to Nagoya, DAP terms. Vessel in question is BW PAVILIONARANTHERA.

Laycan 10-14 April.

Best regards,
Greg Butler
Global Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Rice Freight Quote - Bruinisse to Nagoya
email_chain.body:
Hi Greg,

Thanks for the prompt response.

$82 seems a bit high. We've done our research, and terminal/harbor fees in Bruinisse and Nagoya are relatively low. This should be reflected in the freight rate. Can you sharpen your pencil on this one?

Thanks,
Miquel Dixon

email_chain.subject: Re: Rice Freight Quote - Bruinisse to Nagoya
email_chain.body:
Hi Miguel,

Understood re: port fees. After checking with owners, we can revise our offer to USD79/MT for the BW PAVILIONARANTHERA. That's the best we can do considering the current bunker prices and the tight laycan.

Demurrage rate: USD 12,000 per day pro rata.

Let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Greg

email_chain.subject: Iron Ore - Sakai to Scheveningen
email_chain.body:
G'day Johnny,

Got an inquiry for 6287MT Iron Ore, Sakai to Scheveningen, CFR.

My best offer is AUD63.79, sp.

Let me know asap.

Cheers,
Diego Pérez
Anderson Shipping Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore - Sakai to Scheveningen
email_chain.body:
Diego,

Thanks for the prompt response. AUD63.79 is a bit high. Could you shave that down a bit? 

Also, what's the earliest laycan you can offer?

Johnny Alvarado

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore - Sakai to Scheveningen
email_chain.body:
Johnny,

Okay, look, i could do aud$63.00 aps.

Laycan is flexible, within reason. What's your ideal loading window?

Diego

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore - Sakai to Scheveningen
email_chain.body:
Diego,

$63 is still a little rich for my blood.

What about partial prepayment - if we prepay 50%, would you consider AUD62.00? We need to confirm stem ASAP.

Johnny

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore - Sakai to Scheveningen
email_chain.body:
Johnny,

Alright, Johnny, with 50% prepayment, I can get you aud62.00.

Consider it done.

Diego
